Data classes related to Networking.

class linode_metadata.objects.networking.IPv4Networking(json_data: Dict[str, Any] = None)¶

Information regarding IPv4 addresses.

class linode_metadata.objects.networking.Interfaces(json_data: Dict[str, Any] = None)¶

A network interface attached to a Linode instance.

class linode_metadata.objects.networking.NetworkResponse(json_data: Dict[str, Any] = None)¶

The networking information associated with a Linode instance.
